content: मत्सर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मद्-सरन्; <ls>Uṇ. 3. 73</ls>] {@--1@} Jealous, envious. {@--2@} Insatiate, greedy, covetous. {@--3@} Niggardly. {@--4@} Wicked. {@--5@} Selfish, self-interested. {@--6@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Satisfying. {@--7@} Intoxicating (<ab>Ved.</ab>). --रः {@--1@} Envy, jealousy; अदत्तावकाशो मत्सरस्य <ls>K. 45</ls>; परवृद्धि षु बद्धमत्सराणां <ls>Ki. 13. 7</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 63</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 17.</ls> {@--2@} Hostility, enmity; <ls>R. 3. 60</ls>. {@--3@} Pride; <ls>Śi. 8. 71.</ls> {@--4@} Covetousness, greediness. {@--5@} Anger, passion. {@--6@} The Soma. --रः --रा A gnat.
